rules_text:
As a Subroutine you control enters, insert it into one of your programs. It does not run. 
If you control a Subroutine, move to your next program as your first main phase begins. All Subroutines in that program run. [i](Start at A. After C, go back to A.)[/i]
notes:
!exportname Program A ERR
!tokentag ProgramA
!related Program B ERR;Program C ERR;Download Courier;Mnemologist;Dronehive Rogue;Thrill Rider;Highstride Jockey;RETURN();LOOP();FLOCK();SEND();SEEK();MAP();ALARM() EIW;READ() EIW;TICK() EIW;BOOST() EIW;MOUNT() EIW;RECV();Weave Dispatcher();MASK();BIND();Altered Technophile;WAIT();JUMP();COPY();Catabolist;SIGKILL();BEHOLD();Groove Surfer;PANIC();EXTRACT();REFRACT();Megafauna Knight;GENERATE();WAVE();EXIT();SIGNAL();RESET();BORROW();CHURN();COMPILE();RECURSE();SYSCALL();EXPLODE();The Weftheart;SAVE() ERR;
